Core:PCProperties.Core:Property:
X[M] /*
----------------------------------- LIBRARY CONTENT (Merry/SAM)
Object: Lib:NIP:base:signals:DECIDE Email: kalle@marrach.skotos.net Revision: 10.24 Generated: Sun Sep 25 01:47:28 2011 on Jonkichi Last revision: Mon Nov 17 11:59:01 2003 by zwoc (P)
(Do not modify #list# -- it is automatically constructed.)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- setprop-post:decide (M) This setprop hook executes the "SIGEXEC" stream (0x050) whenever the property "DECIDE" is set in "this". ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*/

X[M] /*
D=This setprop hook executes the "SIGEXEC" stream (0x050) whenever the property "DECIDE" is set in "this".
*/
if( this.DECIDE ) this.SIGSTREAM = 0x050;
